message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. What do you think?
I understand that $130 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $160, which is the lowest I can go. What do you think?
Alice, $160 is still a bit too high for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $140? I'm really interested in this product and think we can make this work.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I can offer you $155. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
